short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 只是简单的密码生成器

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can easily generate strong and secure passwords. You can specify password length and used chars (lowercase, uppercase, numbers or custom). Generated password you can copy directly to your clipboard, or generate more of them and copy them all at one time (or select only which of them you want).
